name: Club Bitcoin: Solitaire
description:
Team up with THNDR Team, a fantastic team obsessed with bitcoin, on a classic Solitaire challenge!

Bitcoin Solitaire is a free-to-play, play-to-earn solitaire game with the goal of solving each deal by matching cards on the correct positions.


- HOW TO PLAY -

The first objective is to release and play into position certain cards to build up each foundation, in sequence and in suit, from the ace through the king. The ultimate objective is to build the whole pack onto the foundations, and if that can be done, the Solitaire game is won.

As you advance through your game, the difficulty increases. Sometimes it is not possible to complete every deal without using a power-up, called magic wand, although if you did it without it you get a higher score!


- TICKETS -
Ticket: Tickets may be used in the daily raffle to win bitcoin! Try to collect as many tickets as possible.

Enjoy your free time to collect as much bitcoin as possible with THNDR Games!
